answers.answer: How much of it do you have to drink??

Good luck! I take mine on Monday and I'm not looking forward to it either! I don't care for sweets much and with this pregnancy it's even worse! If the baby doesn't like it or thinks it's too sweet I have to run to the bathroom!
You'll drink like a cup of it its not dat bad just drink it very fast the after taste is what will make you get sick !!!
What happens if it makes us puke?
Its so nasty i had it on friday.. Ahhhhhh
Good luck,i dont do mine for another 2 weeks
If you puke you'll have to redo the test

It's not too bad! I just did it today :) felt a bit sick around the 50 minute mark and when they took my blood but went home for a lie down and I was fine. Just drink it fast so they start your time fast

Idk but it always makes me sick I get nauseated I get cold sweats AMD get crampy. Don't know why with all my pregnancies. I'm suppose to get results today. I'm hoping I passed. I really don't wanna do the three hour one. But good luck to everyone who has to take it
Will take the test on Thursday ... now im not even looking forward to it....... seems no one likes the test.. 26+4  here  FTM

question: I'm taking my gestational diabetes test today praying I pass, I'm juss dreading the drink. For some reason I always get sick drinking that stuff. Ugh...
title: gd test
